ISSUE.TITLE: export orders with products
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 Steps to reproduce the problem: If the products has attribute combination with (SKU, Price, ....). The exported excel doesn't support this. It should handle the attribute combination

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Next change on fixing problem with data type

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5966 Use the SKU of product attribute combination when export order items
